div.h2: Welcome to the Mattituck-Cutchogue School District

span.em: Parents and Guardians - If your student needs their password reset or has a physical problem with their Chromebook please call (631) 298-8471 Ext. 1407

img.alt: Illustration of knife, fork and spoon
img.title: Illustration of knife, fork and spoon
img.style: float: right; margin-bottom: 5px; margin-left: 5px; margin-top: 1px; width: 125px; height: 125px;

p.img: Non-perishable food items are available for families in need and delivered every Monday at the Cutchogue East bus stops.

div.p: To be included in this service please contact Rafael Morais at rmorais@mufsd.com or call (631) 734-6049 x2102.

The Mattituck-Cutchogue UFSD in cooperation with Greenport School District and SCOPE will be providing child care for our First Responders. Please click here to learn more about the program and to apply.
Questions? Contact Gretchen Chapman at gchapman@mufsd.com.

span.img: Optimum WiFi Emergency Hotspots – Altice has opened up emergency outdoor hotspots for public use to non-subscribers; a map to these free wireless hotsposts can be found on the Optimum Website - click here and enter your zipcode.

span.a: Cutchogue East Elementary Online Learning Plan
Mattituck Jr/Sr High School Online Learning Plan

Questions?
Please complete the Help Desk form here and someone will respond shortly.

div.div: Read the latest Coronavirus update from Superintendent Jill Gierasch ...
Read the April 9th Coronavirus update from Superintendent Jill Gierasch ...
Read the March 31 Coronavirus update from Superintendent Jill Gierasch ...
A letter to the parents and guardians of Special Education students ...

p.span:
The Mattituck-Cutchogue Union Free School District
is dedicated to providing a welcoming and safe environment where diversity, interdependence and self-discovery are valued. Educators, students, families, and community members work together creating a dynamic, flexible, and engaging learning process to:

- Nurture individuals' passion for life and learning
- Foster collaboration, creativity, and critical thinking
- Encourage a range of perspectives
- Promote and practice personal integrity
As a result, students develop academic excellence, confidence, and resiliency to face future challenges in order to contribute to and inspire positive change in the local and global community.
